title: PMS 2.0 267 - TNF Preview, James Jones, Darius Butler, Tom E. Curran, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys preview tonight's Thursday Night Football matchup between the Bucs and Bears, and react to all the news coming out from Tennessee and how Covid is going to impact the NFL season moving forward. Joining the show is Super Bowl Champion, former WR for the Packers and Raiders, and current NFL Network analyst, James Jones. Pat and James discuss everything going on with Covid in the NFL, his thoughts on Aaron Rodgers this season and if he sees anything different in his play, and why he thinks the Bears are going to win tonight, and why he isn't sold on the Bucs and Tom Brady (17:37-41:48). Next, 9 Year NFL defensive back for the Patriots and Colts, co-host of The Man-To-Man Pod, good friend of the program, Darius Butler joins the show to give his QB passing over/under locks for tonight's game, chats about effort on defense, and who he likes in the Thursday Night Football game (44:42-1:03:26). Later on another episode of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk, Pat and AJ welcome in NBC Sports Boston Patriots Insider, Tom E. Curran joins the program to discuss his preseason expectations of the Patriots, his thoughts on the season thus far, and what he thinks the Patriots are going to do moving forward (1:09:31-1:20:44). Plus Pat and AJ discuss tonight's game and give their picks, and chat about the Dewey Haskins situation in Washington (1:05:55-1:36:58). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we have reached 1 million subscribers and are giving away $100,000, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
